import React, { useState } from "react"; import MainTools from "./Tools/MainTools"; import "../styles/ToolsTemplate.css"; const ToolsContext = React.createContext(null); export default function ToolsTemplate(ac) { const APIbody = { "X-Cisco-Meraki-API-Key": `${ac.dc.apiKey}`, organizationId: `${ac.dc.organizationID}`, networkId: `${ac.dc.networkID}`, }; const [switchAllTools, setswitchAllTools] = useState({ 1: false, 2: false }); const shutAllTools = () => { ac.dc.setswitchMainTools(true); let selectBox = document.getElementById("selectBox"); let selectedValue = selectBox.options[selectBox.selectedIndex].value; if (selectedValue === "1") { setswitchAllTools({ 1: true }); } else if (selectedValue === "2") { setswitchAllTools({ 2: true }); } }; const ts = { APIbody, switchAllTools, setswitchAllTools, }; return (

{ac.dc.network}

Network

{ac.dc.organizationID}

Organization ID

{ac.dc.timeZone}

Time Zone

{ac.dc.totalDevices}

Total Devices
{/* */}
Select Tools
{ac.dc.switchMainTools ? :
}
); }
